name: EXASOL AG
tagline: The most powerful engine for your analytics
description:
EXASOL AG is one of the leading manufacturers of analytical database systems. Its scaleable software “Made in Germany” can be found in the areas of data business, customer analytics, operational BI, advanced analytics and data warehousing. With their appliance and cloud solutions, EXASOL AG customers are able to make effective decisions and gain a significant competitive advantage.
The company was founded in Nuremberg in 2000 and has subsidiaries in Brazil, the United States of America and the United Kingdom. Customers from around the world rely on the technologies from EXASOL AG.
